mapper.insert: insert into ward (floor, room, bed) values (#{floor}, #{room}, #{bed}
mapper.delete: delete from ward where floor=#{floor} and room=#{room} and bed=#{bed}
mapper.select: select a.*,b.* from ward a left join elderly b on a.elderlyid=b.elderlyid
select distinct room from ward where floor=#{floor}
select * from ward a left join elderly b on a.elderlyid=b.elderlyid where a.floor=#{floor}
select distinct bed from ward where floor=#{floor} and room=#{room}
select a.*,b.* from ward a left join elderly b on a.elderlyid=b.elderlyid where a.floor=#{floor} and a.room=#{room}
select a.*,b.* from ward a left join elderly b on a.elderlyid=b.elderlyid where a.floor=#{floor} and a.room=#{room} and a.ward=#{ward}
